title: When Harry Met Sally multi-language AVI
description:
Another in my series of bloat-reductions.  I downloaded this 7 GB offering:

 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3699197" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3699197</a>

I ripped it to AVI with AutoGK, preserving the English 5.1, German, Spanish and director&#039;s commentary audio tracks and saving the English, German and Spanish subtitles to external subs.  The result is 1.3 GB and the quality is excellent.
